tweet.text: Specializing in the history of U.S. national security issues or arms control? Current/recent grad students, apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications due Oct. 12 noon (Eastern Time): https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/MJkkY82mhL
tweet.html: Specializing in the history of U.S. national security issues or arms control? Current/recent grad students, apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications due Oct. 12 noon (Eastern Time): bit.ly/OH-PMF
